Features

  • Parameter Management for ABM
  • The Parameter Framework allows the definition of several sources of parameters:
    • Reading parameters from (MySQL-)DB
    • Reading parameters from XML files
    • Setting parameters in Java
  • Definition of parameter in Java Enumerations
    • The Java code allows the definition of default values that are used in case there is no further definition
  • Defining other parameters as default
  • Fine definition of reading order
  • Checking, if a parameter has been set by calling the isCustomised(PmParameterDefinition definition)
  • By-passing of reading parameters from Database in case it is not available
  • Running several instances of the parameter manager (e.g. for different parallel simulation parts)
  • Setting other instances as default parameter manager to consult if no value is assigned for the requested parameter
